funfact: Did you know that honey never spoils? Archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient Egyptian tombs that are over 3,000 years old and still good to eat! 🍯
Octopuses have three hearts! Two pump blood to the gills, and the third pumps it to the rest of the body. 🐙
Fun fact: Bananas are technically berries, but strawberries aren’t! 🍌🍓
The Eiffel Tower can be 15 cm taller during the summer due to the iron expanding in the heat. 🌞
Here’s a fun fact: A day on Venus is longer than a year on Venus! 🌍
Did you know that honey never spoils? Archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient Egyptian tombs that are over 3,000 years old and still good to eat! 🍯
Octopuses have three hearts! Two pump blood to the gills, and the third pumps it to the rest of the body. 🐙
Fun fact: Bananas are technically berries, but strawberries aren’t! 🍌🍓
The Eiffel Tower can be 15 cm taller during the summer due to the iron expanding in the heat. 🌞
Here’s a fun fact: A day on Venus is longer than a year on Venus! 🌍
Did you know that a group of flamingos is called a 'flamboyance'? 🦩
Cows have best friends and can become stressed when separated from them. 🐄❤️
Sharks have been around longer than trees! 🦈🌳
The shortest war in history lasted just 38 minutes. ⏱️
Honeybees can recognize human faces! 🐝😊
Turtles can breathe through their butts. 🐢🍑
The first oranges weren’t orange; they were actually green! 🍊
Dolphins have names for each other. 🐬
The unicorn is the national animal of Scotland. 🦄
Avocados are berries, and they contain more potassium than bananas. 🥑🍌
There are more stars in the universe than grains of sand on Earth. ✨🌍
Wombat poop is cube-shaped! 🐾
Did you know that the dot over the letter 'i' is called a tittle? ✍️
The longest hiccuping spree lasted 68 years. 😲
A bolt of lightning contains enough energy to toast 100,000 slices of bread. ⚡🍞
Sea otters hold hands while sleeping to keep from drifting apart. 🦦🤝
A single strand of spaghetti is called a 'spaghetto.' 🍝
A crocodile cannot stick its tongue out. 🐊
The inventor of the frisbee was turned into a frisbee after he died. 🥏
Sloths can hold their breath longer than dolphins can. 🦥🐬
The heart of a shrimp is located in its head. 🍤
Butterflies can taste with their feet. 🦋
A snail can sleep for three years. 🐌💤
The shortest commercial flight in the world lasts just 57 seconds. ✈️
Did you know that there are more fake flamingos in the world than real ones? 🦩
A group of porcupines is called a 'prickle.' 🦔
The inventor of the Pringles can is now buried in one. 🥔
Did you know that octopuses have blue blood? 🐙💙
Bananas glow blue under black lights. 🍌🔵
There are 293 ways to make change for a dollar. 💵
The word 'nerd' was first coined by Dr. Seuss in 'If I Ran the Zoo.' 📚
Jellyfish have been around for over 500 million years, outliving dinosaurs! 🦕
Horses and cows sleep standing up, but they can only dream lying down. 🐴🐄
It’s impossible to hum while holding your nose. Go ahead, try it! 🎶👃
The average person walks the equivalent of five times around the world in their lifetime. 🚶‍♂️🌍
Pineapples take about two years to grow. 🍍
Kangaroos can’t walk backwards. 🦘
The moon has moonquakes. 🌕🌍
Pigeons can tell the difference between a painting by Monet and Picasso. 🎨🐦
Hot water freezes faster than cold water, a phenomenon known as the Mpemba effect. ❄️
The average person has 4 to 6 dreams a night. 🌙💤
Elephants can recognize themselves in a mirror. 🐘
Cats have fewer toes on their back paws. 🐾
The smell of freshly cut grass is actually a plant distress call. 🌿😱
A group of crows is called a 'murder.' 🐦
A group of frogs is called an 'army.' 🐸
Did you know that humans share 50% of their DNA with bananas? 🍌🧬
There are more atoms in a glass of water than glasses of water in all the oceans on Earth. 🌊
A day on Mercury is twice as long as its year. 🌑
The Amazon rainforest produces 20% of the world’s oxygen. 🌳
There’s a species of jellyfish that is immortal. 🦠
A chef’s hat has 100 pleats, representing the 100 ways to cook an egg. 👨‍🍳🥚
Bats are the only mammals that can fly. 🦇
A group of flamingos is called a 'flamboyance.' 🦩
Honey never spoils; edible honey has been found in ancient Egyptian tombs. 🍯
Humans are the only animals that blush. 😊
Mosquitoes are attracted to the color blue twice as much as any other color. 🦟
An octopus has three hearts and blue blood. 🐙
A sneeze travels about 100 miles per hour. 🤧
The inventor of the lightbulb, Thomas Edison, was afraid of the dark. 💡
There are more public libraries in the U.S. than McDonald’s restaurants. 📚🍔
The word 'strengths' is the longest word in the English language with only one vowel. 💪
The fingerprints of a koala are so indistinguishable from humans that they have on occasion been confused at a crime scene. 🐨
In Switzerland, it is illegal to own just one guinea pig because they get lonely. 🐹
